description: Heading to uni or the office, or going skiing? No matter what your plan is, this jacket will readily tag along. The design is simple, with an adjustable hood and roomy chest and hand pockets. Hardwearing G-1000 Eco fabric will keep the wind at bay and the recycled polyester padding adds warmth without hampering movement. Perfect for cold days in the forest or in the city
name: Fjallraven Vardag Lite Padded Jacket - Mens
